Hero.subtitle: Prophet Muhammad (ﷺ)
Hero.description: “THE BEST OF YOU ARE THOSE WHO ARE BEST TO THEIR WOMEN”

About.title: About the movie
About.description: Several stories of violence against women, based on true events, are closely interwoven and unfold against the backdrop of traditional society in modern Kyrgyzstan, ultimately leading to a series of tragic incidents.
